DOC.brief_summary: This trial is conducted in Europe. The aim of the trial is to evaluate growth response of two somatropin dose regimens in girls with Turner Syndrome.
DOC.brief_title: Growth Response in Girls With Turner Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Turner syndrome If age below 3 years, either body height below 1 SD (standard deviation) with average growth velocity according to chronological age or body height below 0 SD with growth velocity below 1 SD according to chronological age If age above 3 years, body height below 1 SD with average growth velocity according to chronological age Measured parental height available Written informed consent
